## Installation

Add this to your application's `shard.yml`:

```yaml
dependencies:

```

## Usage

```crystal
require "steam"
```

1. Fork it ( https://github.com/[your-github-name]/steam/fork )

types.name: Steam
types.summary: TODO Write documentation for Steam

def.name: generateAuthCode
def.body:
IO::ByteFormat::LittleEndian.encode(time / 30, bytes = Bytes.new(8))
hmac = OpenSSL::HMAC.digest(:sha1, @secret, bytes.reverse!)
offset = (hmac[-1] & 15)
fullcode = ((((hmac[offset].to_i & 127) << 24) | ((hmac[offset + 1].to_i & 255) << 16)) | ((hmac[offset + 2].to_i & 255) << 8)) | (hmac[offset + 3].to_i & 255)
code = ""
5.times do
  code = code + CHARS[fullcode % CHARS.size]
  fullcode = fullcode / CHARS.size
end
return code
